news_header: UNICEF reports that escalating crime has displaced 1.2 million people, including 400,000 children, with significant casualties from recent attacks.
news_text: UNICEF estimates that 1.2 million individuals, including 400,000 children, have been displaced due to rising crime. In the past three weeks, attacks on various facilities have resulted in the deaths of 100 children and injuries to over 800. Ted Chaiban, UNICEF's Deputy Director, noted that nearly 190,000 people are currently in emergency shelters, while others are seeking refuge elsewhere.
